programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Garage Banned: Tired of her siblings, Lori moves to the garage, but quickly finds it's more than she bargained for. (S2, ep 17b)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynner Takes All: Tired of Lynn's poor sportsmanship during board games, the siblings decide to team up to take her down. (S2, ep 19b)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: No Laughing Matter: When Luan overhears her siblings complaining about her comedy, she decides to give it up. (S2, ep 21a)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Mall of Duty: Lincoln wants to go to the mall but has to watch his younger sisters. So he decides to take them to the mall. (S2, ep 22b)

programme.title: Open Season: Call of Nature

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln tries to delay his parent-teacher conference in 'Stall Monitor', then in 'A Pimple Plan', Luan wakes up with a pimple on the day of her first date with Benny. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: An unsatisfied anchovy strays from his brothers in 'What About Meep?', then in 'Hard Time Out', SpongeBob is sent to time out on behalf of his buddy, so Patrick does what he can to help. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs decides to make even more money by opening a hotel in 'Krusty Towers', and then in 'Mrs. Puff, You're Fired', SpongeBob's boating teacher is finally relieved of her duties.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae storm gref wedi chwalu cwt coed y cwningod. When a big storm wrecks the rabbits' tree-house, piecing it back together leads to a big adventure.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Dilys ar ras yn ceisio cael Norman i'r Ganolfan Weithgareddau Mynydd er mwyn hedfan yn Walabi 2. Dilys rushes to get Norman to the Mountain Activities Centre in time to fly in Walabi 2.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus yn llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo'n gweld nad yw ei wy wedi ffrio yn hoff o gael ei chyffwrdd gan ei sbageti! Pablo goes to a café with his Mum and gets an egg and spaghetti hoops, but his food is upset - oh no!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig i blant yn dilyn anturiaethau Tib, Lalw a Bobl. An animated series for children following the adventures of Tib, Lalw and Bobl.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Chîff yn cytuno i fynd am sbin yn y car gyda Crawc ond dim ond os yw e'n cael gyrru. Chiff agrees to accompany Crawc on a day trip out in the car but only if he can drive. Uh-oh.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes dwr ar gyfer injans, a all y dreigiau drwsio pethau heb gael eu stemio! When there's no water for engines, can the dragons fix things without getting steamed up!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Er bod Blero'n hoff iawn o sanau drewllyd, mae traed Talfryn yn achosi problem enfawr. Smelly socks and cheesy feet are good but when it's Talfryn's feet that smell it's a giant problem.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae'r teulu wedi mynd i wersylla, ac mae Deian a Loli'n edrych ymlaen at fwyta malws melys, ond tydi Loli ddim yn rhannu'n deg! Deian and Loli are camping and excited to eat marshmallows!

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gwyneth wedi gweu siwmper i Maldwyn ond ma'r plant yn credu ei fod yn siwtio bwgan brain yn well. Gwyneth has knitted a jumper for Maldwyn but the kids think it better suits scarecrow. [SL]

programme.title: Canu Gyda Fy Arwr
programme.desc: Tro yma mae Rhys Meirion yn cael cwmni y seren Tik Tok o Bontarddulais, Bronwen Lewis. Social media star Bronwen Lewis joins Rhys Meirion to surprise Dorian, a factory worker in Carmarthen. [SL]

programme.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau

programme.title: Yr Whws

programme.title: Awyr Iach

programme.title: Sion y Chef

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae blawd yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd â hi i Fferm Fach i ddangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Flour comes from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Hoff fwyd Twm Twrch yw mwydod, ond heddiw mae Dorti yn ei herio i fod fel hi a pheidio â bwyta mwydod. Today, Dorti challenges Twm Twrch to be like her and to not eat worms at all.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa, and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae bot danfon parseli'n mynd yn dw-lal, ac yn creu trafferthion mawr ar hyd a lled Dyffryn Dryswch. A parcel delivery bot goes haywire, and creates big problems all over Dyffryn Dyrswch.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon yr Estrys a'r Mochyn fferm fydd yn cael y sylw. In this programme, it's the Ostrich and Pig that feature.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Mr Parri yn penderfynu bod cludo bwyd yn y fan i bobl yn llawer rhy araf, felly mae ganddo drôns i wneud y gwaith. Mr Parri has decided to use drones to deliver food to his customers!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dewi Sant sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dewi Sant join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen olaf, cawn glywed sut y cafodd ein galaeth ni, y Llwybr Llaethog, ei chreu. In the final programme of the series, we find out how our home galaxy, the Milky Way, was created.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Adam yn llawn clod i deulu'r cor-bwmpen, ac yn 'Wythnos Ymwybyddiaeth Compostio', mae Meinir yn compostio yn null 'bokashi' o Japan. Sioned's busy curating the wild garden in Pont y Twr.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Awn ati i drefnu priodas John a Becky o Hwlffordd. Mae ganddynt dri o blant, ac maent wedi dyweddïo ers 18 ml! We plan the wedding of John and Becky who've been engaged for eighteen years!

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Bydd Nia yn Aberhonddu i ddysgu mwy am etifeddiaeth grefyddol y fro - Cadeirlan Anglicanaidd y dref, hen gapel Cymraeg y Plough, a mwy. We learn more about Brecon's rich religious heritage.

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Y tro yma, mae Iolo yn chwilio am rywogaethau prinnaf Cymru - llawer ohonyn nhw o dan fygythiad difrifol. Iolo looks for some of Wales' rarest species.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad: Brian Castell Howell
programme.desc: Cwrdd â Brian Jones, y gwr diymhongar tu ôl i fusnes bwyd ac arlwyo llwyddiannus Castell Howell. We meet Brian Jones, the modest man behind successful Welsh business, Castell Howell.

programme.title: New: Emirates Lions v Scarlets
programme.desc: Gêm fyw Pencampwriaeth Rygbi Unedig 2024/25 Vodacom: Emirates Lions v Scarlets. C/G 15:00. Live 2024/25 Vodacom URC game: Emirates Lions v Scarlets. Emirates Airline Park. K/O 15:00.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.desc: Rownd gynderfynol gemau ail gyfle Cymru Premier JD: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd. C/G 17.10. Live football from the JD Cymru Premier play-off semi-final: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd. K/O 17.10.

programme.desc: Stori babi Lydia gafodd ei dwyn o Ysbyty Glan Clwyd yn y 90au, a hanes yr ymdrech enfawr i'w ffeindio hi. The story of Baby Lydia, who was kidnapped from Ysbyty Glan Clwyd in the 90's.

programme.title: Hero of the Hour
programme.desc: 2000. Crime. Directed by David Richards. Stars Ross Kemp, Maggie O'Neill & Julie Armstrong. A security guard becomes a national hero after fending off armed robbers. So why does he feel on edge? [S]

programme.title: Woman in the Dark
programme.desc: 1934. Crime drama. Directed by Phil Rosen. Stars Fay Wray, Ralph Bellamy & Melvyn Douglas. A woman on the run disrupts the peaceful existence of a man recently released from prison. [S]

programme.title: Lady Of Deceit
programme.desc: 1947. Crime Drama. A calculating divorcee risks all by getting involved with a hot-headed murderer. Stars Claire Trevor and Lawrence Tierney. Directed by Robert Wise. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Run Rabbit Run. 1964. Narrated by Niall MacGinnis. Scenes from the beginning of the war in 1940, as the battles begin across Europe. [S]

programme.title: Dick Tracy Vs Crime Inc.
programme.desc: 1941. Action. Directors: John English & William Witney. Stars Ralph Byrd, Michael Owen & Jan Wiley. Dick Tracy goes up against a villain known as The Ghost, who can turn himself invisible.

programme.title: Look At Life High Rise
programme.desc: 1961. An intriguing look at the world of lifts, with a study of the problems faced by engineers to get office workers up to the top of tall buildings.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: Husky Becomes Invisible. 1963. Stars Murray Kash & Libby Morris. Dart is sent to Mars to find the eggs of the Aba bird to help find a cure for a condition known as the floats. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Dead Ringers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Burt Ward. Batman and Robin escape Chandell's trap and plot to outsmart him and put a stop to his malicious plan. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The King's Champion. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, John Bay & Ian Fleming. Led by a pretender to the English throne, a Black Knight issues a challenge that Richard must accept or forfeit his throne. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: The Talisman of Sargon. 1961. Stars David Graham, Graydon Gould & George Murcell. The Supercar team are given the task of stopping Masterspy from getting control of the Talisman of Sargon. [S]

programme.title: Lionheart
programme.desc: Family. 1968. Director: Michael Forlong. Starring: James Forlong, Louise Rush, Ian Jessup, Irene Handl. A lion escapes from a circus but is rescued and protected by a young boy. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Parting Guest. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Patricia Driscoll & Hugh McDermott. Duncan the Scottish Highlander causes problems when he overstays his welcome and becomes infatuated by Marian. [S]

programme.title: The Amazing Transparent Man
programme.desc: 1960. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer. Stars Marguerite Chapman, Douglas Kennedy & James Griffith. A crazed scientist invents an invisibility formula, hoping to create an invisible army. [S]

programme.title: A Day Of One's Own 1956
programme.desc: 1956. Directed by Kenneth Fairbairn. A short film about various housewives around the country taking a day off from their traditional domestic chores.

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Devil's Laughter. 1959. Starring Patrick Westwood, Alfred Ryder and Ben Wright. The authorities encounter problems when trying to carry out the execution of convicted killer, John Marriott. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: 1875. 1963. Stars David Graham, John Bluthal & Paul Maxwell. Commander Zero, Steve and Venus get the key to Prof. Matic's time machine, but their exploration sends them to a Western town in 1875.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Shadow of Fear. 1968. Stars Paul Maxwell, Sylvia Anderson & Francis Matthews. To learn more about the Mysterons, Spectrum have created a plan to capture detailed images of their home planet, Mars.

programme.title: Trafic
programme.desc: 1971. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. Features Marcel Fraval & Honoré Bostel. Mr. Hulot travels to Amsterdam to showcase his new camper van and encounters several hurdles on the way. [S]

programme.title: Web of Suspicion
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Directed by Max Varnel. Stars Philip Friend & Susan Beaumont. When a teacher is wrongly accused of murdering a pupil, he must clear his name and save the school from another tragedy. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Guilt. 1977. Stars Douglas Fielding & James Ellis. Quilley was at school with Chris Murray and knows he wouldn't hurt a soul, so when Chris pleads guilty to a savage assault, he wants to know why. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1970. If It's Got Your Number On It. Created by John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. Freda begins an alliance with an Australian airman only to be discovered by an old flame. [S]

programme.title: Rebecca
programme.desc: 1940. Mystery. Directed by Alfred Hitchcock and starring Laurence Olivier, Joan Fontaine and George Sanders. A self-conscious bride is tormented by the memory of her husband's dead first wife. [S]

programme.title: The People That Time Forgot
programme.desc: 1977. Adventure. Directed by Kevin Connor. Stars Patrick Wayne, Doug McClure & Sarah Douglas. An expedition in search of a lost colleague stumbles upon a prehistoric world hidden in the Arctic. [S]

programme.title: The People That Time Forgot

programme.title: Dance Little Lady
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. The story of a successful dancer who fights with her husband for the attention of their daughter. Starring Terence Morgan, Mai Zetterling and Guy Rolfe. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection

programme.title: Out of Town

programme.title: Down Among The Z Men

programme.title: Target Earth

programme.title: The Angel Who Pawned Her Harp

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.title: Rage at Dawn

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Dead Ringers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Burt Ward. Batman and Robin escape Chandell's trap and plot to outsmart him and put a stop to his malicious plan. [S]

programme.title: The Gentle Sex

programme.title: Look At Life I Protest

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood

programme.title: Out of Town

programme.title: Look At Life In the Honours List

programme.title: Gideon's Way

programme.title: Budgie

programme.desc: TBN's Flagship program features in-depth interviews with leading pastors; authors; musicians; athletes; and politicians.
